name: The Glorious Theory of Excitenessment
body:
# Excitenessment shall prevail!
Hello kids, the incrediawesome Theory of Excitenessment got a website - *just like that*. It's now about to take the world over with rainbow-farting unicorns and eternal happiness. Brace yourselves!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
